user_query: I am considering investing in cryptocurrencies and I need to validate the IBAN numbers for my bank accounts in different countries. Can you validate the IBAN numbers for the Netherlands, Belgium, and Luxembourg? Additionally, provide me with the 24 hours trading data for the cryptocurrency market on QuantaEx.

TaskList.description: Validate the IBAN number for the Netherlands.
Validate the IBAN number for Belgium.
Validate the IBAN number for Luxembourg.
Fetch the 24 hours trading data for the cryptocurrency market on QuantaEx.
